channel.title: KMM on Kigo's Blog - 백엔드 Java 개발자
channel.description: Recent content in KMM on Kigo's Blog - 백엔드 Java 개발자

item.title: Kotlin Multiplatform and Backend Development: 2025 Trends
item.description: One of the backend development trends in 2025 is full-stack development using Kotlin Multiplatform. Let’s explore how to develop from mobile to backend using a single language by combining KMM (Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile) and Ktor.
